tools.name: Get-IntuneAppInventory
tools.description: Audits Intune managed applications, install status, and assignment health.

FailureThresholdPercent.description: Percentage of failed installs before flagging an app. Defaults to 10.

IncludeStore.description: Include store apps (iOS App Store, Google Play, Microsoft Store). Excluded by default.

tools.name: Get-IntuneAutopilotStatus
tools.description: Reports on Windows Autopilot device registration and deployment profile status.

IncludeDeploymentProfiles.description: Include deployment profile details in the report. Defaults to true.

tools.name: Get-IntuneDeviceComplianceReport
tools.description: Reports on Intune managed device compliance status.

OSFilter.description: Filter to a specific OS platform (Windows, iOS, Android, macOS).

StaleDays.description: Days since last check-in before flagging as stale. Defaults to 30.

tools.name: Get-IntunePolicyAssignmentReview
tools.description: Reviews Intune configuration profiles and compliance policies for assignment gaps.

IncludeCompliance.description: Include compliance policies in addition to configuration profiles. Defaults to true.

tools.name: Invoke-IntuneComplianceAudit
tools.description: Runs a full Intune compliance audit and generates an HTML dashboard.

StaleDays.description: Number of days since last check-in before a device is considered stale. Defaults to 30.

OutputPath.description: Directory for the HTML report. Defaults to current directory.

SkipAutopilot.description: Skip Autopilot status check (useful if Autopilot is not in use).
